kampung,63,154,3	script	Weapons Trader	448,{
mes "[^0000FF Weapons Trader ^000000]";
mes "So, what you want buy today?";
next;
menu "Weapons",LmenuWeapons,"Armor and Accessories",LmenuArmor;

LmenuArmor:
mes "[^0000FF Weapons Trader ^000000]";
mes "All items are S-Grade! Just arrived today!!";
next;
menu "Armor",Larmor,"Shield",Lshield,"Garment",Lgarment,"Footgear",Lfootgear,"Accessories",Laccesories;

LmenuWeapons:
mes "[^0000FF Weapons Trader ^000000]";
mes "All this weapons is NEW!!";
mes "I don't sell any used weapons here~";
next;
menu "1-Handed Swords",L1hsword,"2-Handed Sword",L2hsword,"Spears",Lspear,"Axes",Laxe,"Dagger",Ldagger,"Katars",Lkatar,"Bows",Lbow,"Mace",Lmace,"Staff and Rods",Lstaffrod,"Books",Lbook,"Knuckle",Lknuckle,"Whips",Lwhips,"Instruments",Linstrument,"Guns",Lgun,"Fuuma Shuriken",Lfuuma;

Larmor:	callshop "Armor";	end;
Lshield:	callshop "Shield";	end;
Lfootgear:	callshop "Footgear";	end;
Laccesories:	callshop "Accessories";	end;
Lgarment:	callshop "Garments";	end;
	
L1hsword:	callshop "One-Handed Swords";	end;
L2hsword:	callshop "Two-Handed Swords";	end;
Lmace:	callshop "Mace";	end;
Lknuckle:	callshop "Knuckle";	end;
Lspear:	callshop "Spears";	end;
Ldagger:	callshop "Dagger";	end;
Lbow:	callshop "Bows";	end;
Lkatar:	callshop "Katars";	end;
Laxe:	callshop "Axes";	end;
Lstaffrod:	callshop "Staffs / Rods";	end;
Lbook:	callshop "Books";	end;
Lwhips:	callshop "Whips";	end;
Linstrument:	callshop "Instruments";	end;
Lgun:	callshop "Guns";	end;
Lfuuma:	callshop "Fuuma Shuriken";	end;
}
